com.irurueta.units

Class DistanceConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.units.DistanceConverter

  • public class DistanceConverter
extends Object
    Does distance conversions to different units. To prevent loss of accuracy, conversion should only be done as a final step before displaying distance measurements.
